ygData.subject: roger wilco
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I have to say, I tried to - but my cheapo soundcard couldn t handle the beauty of EverQuest simultaneously with RogerWilco running, and so all I sent
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:36 PM 6/3/99 -0500, you wrote:

>p.s. does anyone use Roger Wilco or the other proggies to talk voice inside
>EQ? I have used it in other games but not tried it here. I think it would
>be good for people who already know each other but hard for strangers to
>use. Real voices might be pretty hard to role play with and yet there are
>RP Cons all the time.

Well, I have to say, I tried to - but my cheapo soundcard couldn't handle
the beauty of EverQuest simultaneously with RogerWilco running, and so all
I sent was *FDHFY#YQRH# FNDJF#*RF&FY* :( I could hear fine, but was
sending garbage - so I deleted it. The group I was partying with at the
time was remarkably well organized (if a bit quiet), due to this system,
and we were able to do a lot more (though I'm sure I slowed them down a bit).

Talies the Wanderer
